sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class PropertyDetailUI extends React.Component { render() { const { title, imgUrl, address, price, status, area, beds, baths, garages, description, features } = this.props.property; let renderContent; const { _id, email, name } = this.props.property.user; const { about, mobile, skype } = this.props.agent; let statusColor = status === "rent" ? "warning" : "success"; renderContent = (

{title}

{status}

Quick Summary:

Location {address}
Price ${price}
Property Type: House
Status: {status}
Area: {area} m2
Beds: {beds}
Baths: {baths}
Garages: {garages}
Rating: 5

Property Description:

{description}

Property Features:{" "}

    {features.ac &&
  • Air conditioning
    • } {features.gym &&
  • Gym
    • } {features.bar &&
  • Bar
    • } {features.internet &&
  • Internet
    • } {features.microwave &&
  • Microwave
    • } {features.smoking &&
  • Smoking allowed
    • } {features.fireplace &&
  • Fireplace or fire pit
    • } {features.toaster &&
  • Toaster
    • } {features.tennis &&
  • Tennis Courts
    • } {features.tv &&
  • Cable TV
    • }

Agent:

{name}

{about}

  • Phone: (123) 456 789
  • Mobile: {mobile}
  • Email: {email}
  • Skype: {skype}
View Profile
); return {renderContent}; } } export default PropertyDetailUI;
